section.section: Within 5 days after the end of a race meeting the State Fair Society each year shall pay to the Commission, from the State Fair Society's share of the takeout, a 3.5% State tax on the handle for the race meeting.
However, the State Fair Society is exempt from paying the tax on the handle for all racing days held at Timonium Race Course during the State Fair.
The Commission promptly shall pay the tax collected under this subsection to the Comptroller.

text.section:
The State Fair Society shall allocate to the Maryland-Bred Race Fund:
5% of the breakage; and
1.50% of the mutuel pools.
The State Fair Society shall allocate 0.25% of the mutuel pools to the Maryland Race Track Employees Pension Fund.
